This is five-star fancy at its finest, with dedicated butler service, private pools and access to four exquisite restaurants serving fresh seafood and Asian fusion alongside one of the largest whisky and fine champagne collections in the Maldives. Each villa is fitted with state-of-the-art accoutrements and Middle-Eastern-inspired furnishings in shades of Pacific blue and gold.
